body_html:
@alexmonroe87 reimplementing backprop for a given op would only allow you to control the output prior to the optimizer, so I still don't understand your feature request.

I'm going to close this particular issue since the request is still unclear (to me) after repeated requests for clarfiication.

If you can provide concrete examples of what is not possible / what is hard, (or more evidence of why something is impossible), we can reopen.
